Blogroll

Here's a loosely categorised, irregularly updated collection of the feeds I follow. Because the internet was created to be a library, not a shopping centre. Descriptions are from the feeds themselves, so sorry if they're not very descriptive.

Comics

  • Five things on Friday

    A weekly/occasional newsletter written by James Whatley. By day, I am an integrated strategist/planner working in advertising and communications. Often at the intersection of digital, entertainment, and brand. Five things on Friday is my way of a) collating the most interesting things I find on the internet and b) thinking out loud while reflecting on those things. Along with work, life, culture and basically anything I feel like writing about. It doesn‚Äôt always come on Friday but you always get more than five things.

    Feed for Five things on Friday
